physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Faint residual violaceous discoloration of the medial midfoot, mild ankle tenderness bilaterally. Chest clear to auscultation, no cardiac murmur, no joint effusions.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially presented with bilateral erythematous nodular rash and migratory polyarthralgia, which resolved completely during treatment with corticosteroids.
